title: Square Analog Clock AW-7 PRO
summary: original round and square analog watch face for Android Wear
description: Original round and square analog watch face for Android Wear based on square font. The watch shows analog and digital clock and the current date.Application supports 12/24 time format and any language to dispaly month and day of the week.To control of Watch Face appearence just touch on it.* Left top corner: set round or square shape (only for square devices);* Right top corner: show date and digital clock on/off;* Left bottom color: to change secondary color (there are 15 colors);* Right bottom color: use gray colot to display date and digital clock.
descriptionHTML:
Original round and square analog watch face for Android Wear based on square font. The watch shows analog and digital clock and the current date.
Application supports 12/24 time format and any language to dispaly month and day of the week.
To control of Watch Face appearence just touch on it.
* Left top corner: set round or square shape (only for square devices);
* Right top corner: show date and digital clock on/off;
* Left bottom color: to change secondary color (there are 15 colors);
* Right bottom color: use gray colot to display date and digital clock.
